= Ultra-Edit Syntax Coloring Wordfile = 

This file allows UltraEdit to properly indent and color the syntax of your Soar files.

=== Download Links ===
  * Pending
  
=== Documentation ===
  * Version 15.00 and later: Download and save it into your "wordfile" directory which by default is %appdata%\IDMComp\UltraEdit\wordfiles, unless you have specified a different directory. Further help and documentation is available [http://www.ultraedit.com/support/tutorials_power_tips/ultraedit/add_a_wordfile.html here].

  * Version 14.20 and previous: Visit this [http://www.ultraedit.com/support/tutorials_power_tips/ultraedit/add_a_wordfile_pre_v15.html page] for instructions.
